org.siggd.actor
Class Actor

java.lang.Object
  org.siggd.actor.Actor
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bar, Blob, Box, Circle, Foo, RockCave
public abstract class Actor
extends Object

This class represents an object in the world.

Author:
mysterymath

Constructor Detail

Actor

public Actor(Level level,
             long id)
Constructor. No non-optional parameters may be added to this constructor in subclasses. This should contain only properties, and code that MUST run before later init,

Parameters:
level - The world that contains this actor
id - The id
Method Detail

update

public void update()
Called to perform actor logic

draw

public void draw()
Called to draw the actor. Most actor's won't need this, as LevelView can draw simple textures. Use this if you need more complicated drawing (and make sure your texture is null)

makeBody

public com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body makeBody(String name,
                                                    float scale,
                                                    com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.BodyDef.BodyType bdtype,
                                                    com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 origin)
Make the Box2d body

Parameters:
name - The name of the body in the JSON body definition file
scale - The width of the image
Vector2 - origin [out] Object that will receive the image origin
